column4: hi is there an easy way for me to boot multipul os from my usb drive.
may be installing grub on the usb disk. You should search the web about that as it may require some understanding of grub bootloader
a shame there is no PXE boot with wireless. I would have enhoyed providing free live ubuntu over the air to my neighbours :)
yea i know about grub not much about grub 2 though.
